description: Snowday has made its way to New York food truck fame, winning multiple Vendy Awards (it’s like an Oscar for food trucks), and being ranked highly in numerous top food truck lists, all by serving the community wonderful locally sourced food, and serving a noble cause. Acting as more than just a mobile eatery, the Snowday truck is a "vehicle for social justice", as its run by Drive Change, a New York-based organization that trains, employs, and empowers formerly incarcerated youth in hopes of helping them find work and keeping them out of prison. Their menu features a rotation of seasonal cuisine, and you’re always sure to find their maple-inspired dishes to be quite delicious, like their Maple Curry Chicken Salad, Fried & Smoked Spare Ribs, their Famous Maple Grilled Cheese Sandwich, and so much more. For a delectable dining experience that fulfills your appetite and soul, make your way straight to Snowday.
name: Snowday
